resources.string: Thank you for registering . It may take up to 3 business days to process your application.
You may proceed to login and view the list of token sales available for participation.
By clicking Submit you are bounded to purchase the tokens indicated above.
Earn 3% of whatever your referred friends purchase! As a bonus, you will also earn 1% of your friend\'s referees purchases
First 3 top referrals get the new Apple iPhone XR. Promotion ends 31st Dec 2018
Our unique two tier referral system will allow you to earn passive income for life. Earn 3% from direct referee and 1% from child referees
If A buys $100 worth of tokens, you will earn $3
If C buys $100 worth of tokens, A will earn $3 while You will earn $1
Your password has been reset and a new password has been sent to you.
CVEN is the name Concordia Ventures token
Please send ETH to the following smart contract address
You will receive CVEN immediately via smart contract feature.
Please send your CVEN tokens to the address indicated below. Ethereum gas fees apply. ETH will be credited back to the same wallet.
